channel.title: Assignment 0: Hello, World! :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Assignment Overview Task 1: Project Introduction Task 2: Hello, World! Task 3: Test and Commit

item.title: Task 1: Project Introduction
item.description: Your first assignment is mostly an exercise in following instructions. We’ll ask you to modify an existing program so that, when run, the program prints “Hello world!”. Warning In order to complete this assignment there are a few things that you will need to have already completed! You can find these items below:

item.title: Task 2: Hello, World!
item.description: Once you have the assignment open within Visual Studio Code, have a look around the various files and get curious about what this code does. Don’t be afraid to look - just don’t edit any of this code just yet.

item.title: Task 3: Test and Commit
item.description: Test Code Locally Run the following command to test your newly updated code to see if it passes the tests: npm test
